text:
A. PV = -202,971.39; I/Y = 8 / 12 = 0.6667; PMT = 0; FV = 1,000,000;
CPT + N = 240. 240 months is 20 years; she will be 55 years old.
B. Don't clear TVM functions. PMT = -250; CPT -- N = 220, which is 18.335 years,
so she will be 53. (N is actually 220.024, so the HP calculator displays 221.)
